CustomField.formula: If( ISBLANK(Apttus_Config2__BasePriceOverride__c), If( NokiaCPQ_Configuration_Type__c =='Bundle', NCPQ_Unitary_CLP__c, ROUND(Apttus_Config2__BasePrice__c ,2) ), If( TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ChargeType__c)!='Standard Price' && NokiaCPQ_Configuration_Type__c !='Bundle', Apttus_Config2__BasePriceOverride__c, If( NokiaCPQ_Configuration_Type__c =='Bundle', NCPQ_Unitary_CLP__c, Apttus_Config2__BasePriceOverride__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: Unitary CLP
